https://zkkit.org/.title: ZK-Kit: Zero-Knowledge Development Libraries
https://zkkit.org/.info: Comprehensive overview of ZK-Kit libraries including API documentation, features, supported languages (JavaScript, Circom, Noir, Solidity, Rust), and use cases like MACI, Privacy Pools, Zupass

https://docs.circom.io/.title: Circom 2 Documentation
https://docs.circom.io/.info: Official documentation for Circom circuit compiler v2.2.3 written in Rust, including language features, Circomlib templates, API specifications, and 1.5k GitHub stars

https://github.com/iden3/snarkjs.title: SnarkJS: zkSNARK implementation in JavaScript & WASM
https://github.com/iden3/snarkjs.info: JavaScript and WASM implementation of zkSNARK supporting Groth16, PLONK, FFLONK with 2k GitHub stars, Node.js/browser compatibility, and trusted setup ceremony support

https://arkworks.rs/.title: Arkworks: Rust ecosystem for zkSNARK
https://arkworks.rs/.info: Comprehensive Rust ecosystem for zkSNARK programming with implementations of Groth16, Marlin, GM17, finite fields, elliptic curves, and R1CS constraints

https://docs.rs/solana-zk-sdk.title: Solana ZK SDK Documentation
https://docs.rs/solana-zk-sdk.info: Official Solana crate for creating and verifying zero-knowledge proofs on encrypted data, version 4.0.0, 45.96% documentation coverage, supports zk-token and ZK ElGamal proof programs

https://github.com/Lightprotocol/light-p.title: Light Protocol: The ZK Compression Protocol For Solana
https://github.com/Lightprotocol/light-p.info: Zero-knowledge compression protocol enabling rent-free tokens and PDAs on Solana, 291 GitHub stars, documentation at zkcompression.com with comprehensive developer resources

https://www.zkcompression.com/.title: ZK Compression Framework Documentation
https://www.zkcompression.com/.info: Technical documentation for ZK Compression framework reducing Solana storage costs by 98-5000x through state compression and zero-knowledge proofs, with TypeScript/Rust SDKs

https://github.com/ventali/awesome-zk.title: Awesome ZK: Curated list of Zero-Knowledge resources
https://github.com/ventali/awesome-zk.info: Comprehensive curated list of ZK libraries and tools including Circom, Bulletproofs, Bellman, Arkworks, Plonky2, Spartan, and projects like Light Protocol for Solana

https://solana.stackexchange.com/questio.title: Does Solana support any popular zkSNARK libraries?
https://solana.stackexchange.com/questio.info: Community discussion revealing that Solana does not natively support zkSNARK libraries, requires ad-hoc implementations, mentions upcoming curve-25519 syscall for simple pairing-based zkSNARKs

https://github.com/iden3/snarkjs.title: snarkjs: zkSNARK implementation in JavaScript & WASM
https://github.com/iden3/snarkjs.info: Implementasi zkSNARK dan PLONK dalam JavaScript & WASM, mendukung Groth16/PLONK/FFLONK, kompatibel dengan circom, GitHub 2k stars, 472 forks, 47 contributors

https://github.com/privacy-scaling-explo.title: zk-kit: Monorepo reusable libraries for zero-knowledge
https://github.com/privacy-scaling-explo.info: Monorepo pustaka JS/TS untuk ZK dengan packages seperti @zk-kit/eddsa-poseidon, @zk-kit/imt, GitHub 354 stars, 110 forks, 41 contributors

https://docs.rs/solana-zk-sdk.title: solana_zk_sdk - Rust crate documentation
https://docs.rs/solana-zk-sdk.info: Official Solana ZK SDK v4.0.0 dalam Rust untuk pembuatan dan verifikasi zero-knowledge proofs pada data terenkripsi, Apache-2.0 license

https://lightprotocol.com/.title: Light Protocol - ZK Compression for Solana
https://lightprotocol.com/.info: ZK Compression framework untuk Solana, memungkinkan pembuatan token/PDA dengan biaya fraksional tanpa mengorbankan L1 performance, open-source development

https://github.com/anagrambuild/tour-de-.title: tour-de-zk: Solana list of ZK projects
https://github.com/anagrambuild/tour-de-.info: Katalog lengkap proyek ZK di Solana termasuk syscalls (Poseidon, Altbn128), Groth16 verifiers, dan integrasi library seperti Light Protocol

https://github.com/iden3/circom.title: iden3/circom: zkSnark circuit compiler
https://github.com/iden3/circom.info: Compiler zkSnark circuits written in Rust, language for defining arithmetic circuits for zero-knowledge proofs, 1.5k stars, 341 forks, 68 contributors, GPL-3.0 license

https://docs.circom.io/.title: Circom 2 Documentation
https://docs.circom.io/.info: Comprehensive Circom documentation covering language features, compiler, circomlib, circomlibjs, circom_tester, ffjavascript, and snarkjs ecosystem. Provides detailed tutorials and examples.

https://docs.gnark.consensys.io/.title: gnark: Welcome to zk-SNARK library
https://docs.gnark.consensys.io/.info: Fast zk-SNARK library offering high-level API for circuit design in Go, includes playground, debugging tools, and comprehensive documentation. Open source under Apache-2.0 license

https://github.com/arkworks-rs/snark.title: arkworks-rs/snark: Interfaces for Relations and SNARKs
https://github.com/arkworks-rs/snark.info: Rust ecosystem for zkSNARKs providing interfaces for Relations and SNARKs, 883 stars, 253 forks, 34 contributors, 3.4k dependents, but still prototype quality not ready for production

https://docs.rs/plonky2.title: plonky2: Rust crate documentation
https://docs.rs/plonky2.info: Rust implementation of SNARK based on PLONK and FRI techniques, 1.1.0 version, multiple modules including batch_fri, field, hash, plonk, recursion, and utilities. 48.26% documentation coverage

https://chain.link/education-hub/zk-snar.title: ZK-SNARK vs ZK-STARK - Explained Simple
https://chain.link/education-hub/zk-snar.info: Comprehensive technical comparison between zk-SNARKs and zk-STARKs including proof sizes, verification times, trusted setup requirements, and security differences. Provides statistical data on adoption rates and performance metrics.

https://consensys.io/blog/zero-knowledge.title: Zero-Knowledge Proofs: STARKs vs SNARKs
https://consensys.io/blog/zero-knowledge.info: Detailed analysis of performance, security, and implementation differences between STARKs and SNARKs for blockchain applications. Includes quantum resistance comparison and gas cost analysis with specific ratios.

https://hacken.io/discover/zk-snark-vs-z.title: Comparing ZK-SNARKs & ZK-STARKs: Key Distinctions
https://hacken.io/discover/zk-snark-vs-z.info: Technical comparison focusing on security properties, performance metrics, and practical implementation considerations. Covers scalability, quantum resistance, and blockchain rollup applications.

https://www.calibraint.com/blog/zk-snark.title: Decoding ZK-SNARK VS STARK: An In-Depth Comparative Analysis
https://www.calibraint.com/blog/zk-snark.info: Deep-dive analysis of zk-SNARKs vs zk-STARKs with detailed specifications, implementation complexity, and blockchain use cases. Provides adoption statistics and technical requirements.

https://www.helius.dev/blog/zero-knowled.title: Zero-Knowledge Proofs: Its Applications on Solana
https://www.helius.dev/blog/zero-knowled.info: Comprehensive overview of ZK implementation in Solana including both SNARK and STARK applications, performance metrics, cost reductions, and technical specifications of current implementations.

https://lhorla.medium.com/a-deep-dive-on.title: A deep dive on zk on Solana vs Ethereum
https://lhorla.medium.com/a-deep-dive-on.info: Side-by-side comparison of zk implementation between Solana (ZK Compression) and Ethereum (ZK Rollups). Covers architectural differences, cost benefits, and scalability approaches.

https://solana.stackexchange.com/questio.title: Does Solana support any popular zkSNARK libraries?
https://solana.stackexchange.com/questio.info: Technical community discussion about Solana's native support limitations for zk-SNARK libraries, future plans for syscall implementations, and current ad-hoc solutions available.

https://ethereum.stackexchange.com/quest.title: zk-SNARKs vs. Zk-STARKs vs. BulletProofs? (Updated)
https://ethereum.stackexchange.com/quest.info: Detailed performance benchmarks showing zk-SNARK prover time of 2.3s vs zk-STARK 1.6s, verification times of 10ms vs 16ms, and proof sizes of 288 bytes vs 45,000 bytes respectively.

https://superteamtr.substack.com/p/compa.title: Comparing zk-Rollups on Ethereum and zk-Compression on Solana
https://superteamtr.substack.com/p/compa.info: Comprehensive technical comparison of zk Rollups on Ethereum vs zk Compression on Solana including architectural differences, cost efficiency (160x cheaper for token accounts), and performance characteristics with specific examples.

https://www.mdpi.com/2078-2489/15/8/463.title: Evaluating the Efficiency of zk-SNARK, zk-STARK, and Bulletproof
https://www.mdpi.com/2078-2489/15/8/463.info: Performance research evaluating efficiency metrics of zk-SNARK, zk-STARK, and Bulletproof technologies, showing zk-SNARKs produce smallest proofs while zk-STARKs generate largest, with timing analysis for proof generation.

https://research.utwente.nl/files/484230.title: Systematic Review Comparing zk-SNARK, zk-STARK, and Bulletproof Protocols
https://research.utwente.nl/files/484230.info: Academic research analyzing comparative performance and security implications of implementing zk-SNARKs, zk-STARKs, and bulletproof protocols for privacy-preserving applications, focusing on blockchain and financial use cases.

https://github.com/iden3/circom.title: circom - zkSnark circuit compiler
https://github.com/iden3/circom.info: Compiler sirkuit ZK dengan 1.5k GitHub stars, mendukung R1CS, WebAssembly output, template modular, dan ekosistem lengkap dengan circomLib dan tools analisis statis

https://github.com/iden3/snarkjs.title: snarkjs - zkSNARK implementation in JavaScript & WASM
https://github.com/iden3/snarkjs.info: Implementasi JavaScript/WASM untuk zkSNARK dan PLONK dengan 2k GitHub stars, mendukung browser/Node.js, trusted setup multi-party, dan 7.8k repositori yang menggunakannya

https://github.com/privacy-scaling-explo.title: zk-kit - Monorepo of reusable ZK libraries
https://github.com/privacy-scaling-explo.info: Monorepo ZK library TypeScript dengan 354 GitHub stars, menyediakan Merkle Trees (IMT/LeanIMT/SMT), kriptografi ZK, dan tools untuk JavaScript/TypeScript developers dengan ekosistem PSE

https://zkmopro.org/blog/circom-comparis.title: Comparison of Circom Provers - Mopro
https://zkmopro.org/blog/circom-comparis.info: Perbandingan kinerja berbagai prover Groth16 untuk Circom, menunjukkan rapidsnark dan witnesscalc mengungguli snarkjs dalam hal kecepatan, dengan data benchmark spesifik untuk sirkuit RSA dan zk-email

https://arxiv.org/abs/2409.01976.title: Benchmarking ZK-Friendly Hash Functions and SNARK Proving Systems
https://arxiv.org/abs/2409.01976.info: Studi benchmark komprehensif untuk fungsi hash ZK-friendly dan sistem SNARK, menunjukkan Poseidon2 memberikan pengurangan biaya on-chain 73% pada EVM dan 26% pada Hedera

https://github.com/wkennedy/solana-zk-pr.title: Solana ZK Proof Example
https://github.com/wkennedy/solana-zk-pr.info: Contoh implementasi ZK-SNARK proof dan verifikasi on-chain di Solana menggunakan alt_bn128_pairing syscall, menunjukkan pola integrasi praktis untuk verifikasi Groth16 di blockchain Solana

https://ceur-ws.org/Vol-3791/paper7.pdf.title: zkSNARKs Libraries for Blockchains: a Comparative Study
https://ceur-ws.org/Vol-3791/paper7.pdf.info: Studi komparatif akademik antara Circom dan ZoKrates, menunjukkan Circom menghasilkan file sirkuit 4x lebih kecil, proving keys lebih efisien, dan biaya gas smart contract lebih rendah

https://arxiv.org/pdf/2502.07063.title: Zero-Knowledge Proof Frameworks: A Systematic Survey
https://arxiv.org/pdf/2502.07063.info: Survey komprehensif 25 framework ZKP dengan analisis usability, accessibility, dan performance. Menyediakan framework evaluation untuk circom, snarkjs dan library lainnya

https://www.helius.dev/blog/zero-knowled.title: Zero-Knowledge Proofs: Its Applications on Solana
https://www.helius.dev/blog/zero-knowled.info: Comprehensive comparison between SNARKs and STARKs including performance metrics (proof sizes, verification times), security implications, and Solana-specific considerations. Key finding: Groth16 proof size ~128B vs STARK ~45KB; Solana ZK Compression costs: 100k CU verifier + 100k CU system overhead

https://chain.link/education-hub/zk-snar.title: zk-SNARK vs zk-STARK: Complete Comparison
https://chain.link/education-hub/zk-snar.info: Detailed comparison of zk-SNARKs (succinct, fast verification, trusted setup required) vs zk-STARKs (transparent, quantum-resistant, scalable). SNARK: proof sizes 100-200B, quantum vulnerable; STARK: larger proofs, post-quantum secure

https://github.com/coinbase/x402.title: x402: A payments protocol for the internet
https://github.com/coinbase/x402.info: x402 protocol technical specifications by Coinbase. Protocol uses HTTP 402 status code for internet payments, supports multiple blockchain networks including Solana. Enables micropayments without registration, OAuth, or complex signatures

https://blog.zksecurity.xyz/posts/solana.title: Phantom Challenge Soundness Bug in Solana ZK Proof Program
https://blog.zksecurity.xyz/posts/solana.info: Technical analysis of Phantom Challenge Soundness Bug in Solana's ZK ElGamal Proof Program discovered June 2025. Critical vulnerability allowed unauthorized token minting through malformed proofs. Highlighted importance of Fiat-Shamir transcript security

https://thequantuminsider.com/2025/01/04.title: Solana Quantum Resistant Vault Implementation
https://thequantuminsider.com/2025/01/04.info: Security analysis of Solana's Winternitz Vault - quantum-resistant vault using Winternitz One-Time Signatures (WOTS). Provides 224-bit quantum resistance using truncated Keccak256. Optional feature not enabled by default

https://ethresear.ch/t/benchmarking-zkp-.title: Benchmarking ZKP Development Frameworks: The Pantheon of ZKP
https://ethresear.ch/t/benchmarking-zkp-.info: Benchmarking study of ZKP frameworks including Circom, gnark, Arkworks, Starky, Plonky2. Results: Groth16 fastest prover times but largest proofs, STARK frameworks 5-50x faster than SNARKs but require larger proof sizes. Starky shows significant speed advantages

https://medium.com/@mehialiabadi/plonk-v.title: PLONK vs Groth16: Implementation Comparison
https://medium.com/@mehialiabadi/plonk-v.info: Practical comparison between Groth16 and PLONK implementations. Groth16: ~200B proof size, per-circuit trusted setup, faster prover. PLONK: 500-1000B proof size, universal setup, 2.25x slower prover but flexible for multiple circuits

https://www.quicknode.com/guides/solana-.title: Confidential Transfers on Solana: A Developer's Guide
https://www.quicknode.com/guides/solana-.info: Developer's guide to implementing confidential transfers on Solana using Token-2022 Confidential Transfer Extension. Uses ElGamal encryption and ZK proofs for privacy, requires off-chain proof generation, on-chain verification with ZK ElGamal Proof Program

https://www.helius.dev/blog/solana-build.title: Solana Builders — ZK Compression
https://www.helius.dev/blog/solana-build.info: Technical details of ZK Compression implementation using Groth16 SNARKs with ~128B proof size, achieving 5000x cost reduction for account creation. Requires alt_bn128 syscalls for pairing operations. Currently limited to 100k CU verification costs
